Das Naturbild mit dem Felsenberg, der sich von oben und unten gegenübersteht, zeigt den Kontrast und die Details.
Der Chipsatz erscheint aktiviert.
Ein Blick in die Natur, der die Bildqualität von Nicht-4K-Inhalten und hochskalierten 4K-Inhalten vergleicht.
Ein Bildschirm, der ein Bild eines Waldes zeigt und dessen Helligkeit je nach Umgebung angepasst wird.
Eine UHD-TV-Halterung an der Wand hinter einem Tisch mit Zen-Stil-Einstellung.
Das Logo von hey google Das Logo von alexa built-in Das Logo von Works mit Apple AirPlay Das Logo von Works mit Apple Home
Das Bild zeigt ein Paar, das eine Sendung mit einem LG UHD-Fernseher anschaut.

Ein Filmregisseur blickt auf einen großen TV-Monitor und bearbeitet etwas. Der Fernsehbildschirm zeigt einen Kran vor einem violetten Himmel. Das Logo des FILMMAKER MODE befindet sich in der unteren rechten Ecke.

Die Logos der Streaming-Dienste sind abgebildet und daneben die passenden Ausschnitte aus Filmen und Serien. Es gibt Bilder von Wednesday auf Netflix, TED LASSO auf Apple TV, National Treasure auf Disney Plus, The rings of power auf PRIME VIDEO und leopard auf LG CHANNELS.
Ein Video, das ein Auto in einem Videospiel von hinten verfolgt, während es in der Dämmerung durch eine hell erleuchtete Straße fährt.

featured.headline: Muy buenas funciones. E Imagen increible
featured.body: Compré esta TV hace 2 días y la imagen es increíble, es de 43 es una UHD, brillo, muy buenos y sonido aceptable, no es una oled, pero está muy bien. Todo las TV de mi casa son LG y van de maravilla. Recomendable 100%.
featured.author: Pepar

featured.headline: Good tv, poor instructions
featured.body: I am very happy with the television. The sound is only ok but I was aware of that and decided to buy a sound bar prior to purchase. The absence of a printed manual. Apart from the quick set up guide was a major inconvenience. Especially as the print on a downloaded version by phone was too small to read. It was only after I was able to obtain a copy, downloaded to a PC, that I was able to fine tune the set to the sound bar. As someone who is hard of hearing it was a struggle to find the setting for sub-titles and it is highly inconvenient to have to resort to the settings menu and then the accessibility menu to turn the subtitles on and off rather than by clicking on the remote.
featured.author: Trevor Lindsay

featured.headline: Great picture
featured.body:
Good TV with very clear sharp picture. 
The TV it replaced had deteriorating image and of all the brands I compared LG to (Samsung, Sony, Panasonic & Toshiba) this had by far the sharpest image. It is very difficult to see the pixels close up, whereas on other they were visible.
I use a Freesat recorder and this hooks up easily to the HDMI port and the volume & channel change can be controlled by the Freesat remote.
My only concern is if Freely will be available, as an app, rather than having to purchase another hook on HDMI device.....time will tell
featured.author: Dave40612

featured.headline: TV with excellent picture, sound and features
featured.body:
Excellent picture, sound and features. We bought it for the freesat, netflix and spotify apps and it is excellent for all of this.
Love the way you can download new apps, only wish you could program the quick select buttons on the remote and uninstall Alexa.
One tip: it seems that a 2TB USB drive is the maximum size that is reliably supported - recording works very well, but bear in mind that there is only a single freesat receiver, so you can't record and watch another channel.  but then you do have iPlayer ITV X, etc.
Overall - very impressed
featured.author: DaiHard46664

featured.headline: New TV day, and its an LG!
featured.body: It arrived and was easy to set up in place of the 14 year old Sony. Great picture quality and ease of use are standout qualities. Its sound quality is not so great, tinny, and lacking. I get the impression that LG have not resourced this fully in order to sell its sound bars. However i am not deterred and appreciate great sound but i am also not ready to retire my Technics hifi and 5.1 speaker system. However getting connected to this is challenging. I would welcome some anologue connections.
featured.author: Curry D

featured.headline: Satellite and centre stand not legs at the ends
featured.body: This is my third LG large screen TV and second one with Freesat and centre-mounted stand which allows it to sit on a smaller table. Bought for AirBnB which only has a satellite connection and wifi. The older LG - 15 years on - had lost brightness so has been moved to a bedroom where it won't need to outshine sunlit aouth facing windows. This new one seems well up to that and of course 4K for the streaming input. Very easy to set up.
featured.author: DavieK

featured.headline: No manual
featured.body:
TV is fine but setting up was not straightforward without a manual.
Using the remote was trial and error with no clear instructions.
Still cannot find how to pause live TV with no pause button on remote.
Have downloaded instructions manual but says nothing about how to pause.
Please help.
Otherwise excellent picture and sound.
featured.author: John29

featured.headline: Good value TV
featured.body:
Good value everything works as it should , Manual only available online but helps to go through some of the menu's , easy set up if you follow the on screen menus.
would help if the channel changer and sound changer had painted plus and minus signs
featured.author: C Peatfield
